Package org.forgerock.openam.oauth2.provider

Defines OAuth 2.0 provider.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ClientVerifier
    The authorization server SHOULD require all clients to register their redirection endpoint prior to utilizing the authorization endpoint

    The authorization server SHOULD require the client to provide the complete redirection URI (the client MAY use the "state" request parameter to achieve per-request customization).
    ResponseType
    This class provides the functions that need to be implemented to create a response type for the authorize endpoint.
    Scope
    This interface needs to be implemented to take advantage of OAuth2's scope feature.

Package org.forgerock.openam.oauth2.provider Description

Defines OAuth 2.0 provider.
